text: A Tale Etched in Blood and Hard Black Pencil is the tenth novel by Christopher Brookmyre. ==Awards== It has been long-listed for the 2008 Theakston's Old Peculier Crime Novel of the Year Award. ==External links== *Grim and Bear it, The Guardian review. Category:2006 British novels Category:Novels by Christopher Brookmyre
title: A Tale Etched in Blood and Hard Black Pencil
